snippet: The slow rollout of the Dodd-Frank Act has left many frustrated, but regulators are slowly chipping away at the extensive rules and regulations needed to carry out the overhaul, the author writes.
abstract: The slow rollout of the Dodd-Frank Act has left many frustrated, but regulators are slowly chipping away at the extensive rules and regulations needed to carry out the overhaul, the author writes.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
